itemDescription: employee of the Conservative Party of the United Kingdom

wikipedia_page.main: Olivia Caroline Bloomfield, Baroness Bloomfield of Hinton Waldrist (born 30 June 1960) is a British life peer and member of the House of Lords.

response: Current members of the U.K. House of Lords include James O'Shaughnessy, Baron O'Shaughnessy, Olivia Bloomfield, Baroness Bloomfield of Hinton Waldrist, and Jo Valentine, Baroness Valentine.
*Olivia Bloomfield, Baroness Bloomfield of Hinton Waldrist (born 1960), British political party executive
